phrases: Student Council Room Everybody Loves Somebody
Student Council Room Everybody Loves Somebody
Thanks for picking these up for me.
Must be tough handling everything by yourself.
I do not do it all.
Remi and Sengoku-kun handle the things they are able to handle.
Remi always opens this window for us, so we get this nice breeze.
It is kind of cool how you work this hard, even when nobody's looking.
Wait, are you talking about me?
We were supposed to head home together, but you did not show.
Ugh, you must be dying of heat!
Promise me you will take your jacket off when you walk home!
Here, I got some frozen treats.
Have one with Toru when he gets here.
I see, they are from Hori.
I see, they are from Hori.
This is what you stopped me for?
So I am your garbage disposal?
Oh, Miyamura-kun, your tongue's turned white.
Maybe'because I am eating this popsicle.
Glad you two are enjoying this.
I bet I am the only one who did not get anything.
Whoa, Ishikawa-kun, your tongue's kind of long.
I will have to tell Remi and Sakura about it later.
She is on the student council with Remi and I.
Come to think of it, there are a lot of girls on the council.
You get to use the A/C in the council room as much as you want...
You have that much power, Prez?!
Do not make me out to be some villain.
Though, yes, the A/C is a special privilege.
You can swing by the student council to cool off any time.
Hori-san and Mimyamura-kun have to go!
They swung by... and brought friends.
Oolong tea, orange juice, a cola... what else?
Hey, are Hori-san and Miyamura- kun really not dating?
I feel like Ishikawa-kun would be a way better match for Hori-san!
He just gave up on her.
Ishikawa-kun has a crush on Hori-san?
If you really want to be with Kyo-chan,
you would better be one hell of a masochist.
Ishikawa-kun has a crush on Hori-san...
They sure are taking their time getting drinks.
Wonder what they are up to?
I do not mean, like, they are doing anything weird!
What could they get up to in the middle of the day at school?
So... what are they up to?
I should not have put it that way...
I bet Miyamura just dropped the change or something.
I bet Miyamura just dropped the change or something.
I bet Miyamura just dropped the change or something.
Yoshikawa's kindness deserves to be put in the class log for posterity.
Good thing I am class leader today.
Do not fill the classroom log with useless crap.
Stop messing around with my hair!
We would have been back sooner.
I am really sorry to do this to you, Ishikawa-kun.
I do not want to hear it!
I do not want to hear it!
I do not want to hear it!
He was holding Toru's soda when...
If I were you, I would be going after the guy who did me like that!
That is how a real man handles it!
You have got a bunch of pens, right?
Could you stab me in the arm with one?
Just because you got screwed out of a drink?
Yeah, one thing lead to another.
I should have tried to stop it before it happened,
It is not good at all!
Ugh, c'mon, it is just a soda.
-Now we got to clean the floor.
-Now we got to clean the floor.
I got all worried for nothing.
It is okay, I do not mind the heat.
Though at night, I will sleep without clothes on.
Ugh, I should just study in the student council room next time...
I just thought that was normal...
Come to think of it, he does not get embarrassed about undressing.
Wait, was I supposed to get embarrassed when he undressed?!
Ugh, just thinking about it makes me feel embarrassed...
Hey, Miyamura, can I see your tattoos?
All I asked was to see them and you just start stripping?!
You did not even ask why, you just stripped!
Your shouting is way scarier, Hori-san...
You are just cool with stripping in front of people?
I mean, you know what it looks like, so...
What about if you stripped in front of Toru?
Well, yeah, but he knows about the tattoos and stuff.
If Toru stripped in front of you, would you get flustered?
I guess it depends on the situation.
Why are you asking me all this?
Because you do not seem to get flustered about anything.
I was wondering what would get you flustered.
Like, I have not really seen you get embarrassed or blush...
I am always the one freaking out about stuff, right?
Wait, was I supposed to be embarrassed just now?
Okay, let us try it again!
Hey, Hori-san, do you really think I have never gotten flustered, ever?
S-So not long ago, I ran into a friend from middle school.
You are finally growin' up on me.
Do not play coy with me, bro!
You mean me being a senior in high school now?
Heard you missed too many days and got held back.
That is not what I mean, you moron!
I am talking about that girlfriend you are always walking around with!
I do not mind the joke, but Hori-san would.
You do not call your girlfriend by her first name?
I blurted it out in the moment...
I thought I would be fine with him thinking you are my girlfriend,
but it still got me all flustered...
Oh, but do not worry, I will tell him right now that we are not dating.
I mean, you do not have to tell him we are not...
Do not get all polite on me!
I told her we are going to do a double date sometime!
Do not forget to use protection, wink wink!
I told her we are going to do a double date sometime!
Do not forget to use protection, wink wink!
Do not forget to use protection, wink wink!
-Like hell I am letting you see that!
I have never seen you this worked up before, Miyamura.
Oh, no, it is just'because he is such a moron.
Is that how you always talk to your friends from middle school?
I thought Miyamura was the kind of guy who never god mad.
Why do not you try that kind of reaction with Toru?
Maybe once we get to be better friends.
He is shy about the weirdest stuff.
You guys are pretty good friends already though, yeah?
There is so much I do not know about Miyamura.
I wonder what he was like in middle school...
Mmkay, I got that, and that...
Am I coming down with a cold?
Is it because I blasted the A/C after it was fixed?
-No way, only morons catch colds in the summer.
-No way, only morons catch colds in the summer.
Yeah, I borrowed the CD from Shu.
Apparently it came out last week.
Maybe I will ask to borrow it, too.
Is that guy hitting on her?
What the hell are you doing, Shindo?!
-He punched him without a second thought!
I have been your friend for forever!
You should at least introduce me!
Koichi Shindo, second year, went to my school.
Sounds like how you would find him on Google...
You just said he went to your school.
Yeah, but I am at Yasaka!
Hasaka High = Best School in the City AKA Pachi High.
Yeah, but I am at Yasaka!
Hasaka High = Best School in the City AKA Pachi High.
Still wish I could have gone to Katagiri with you.
Because you seem to be having a good time there.
I told you, we are not like that!
Guys, if we are going to stop and chat, can we do it somewhere with A/C?
Why do not we hit up a restaurant, then?
Aw, crap, that is the bell.
We got to change classrooms, right?
You going to go to class?
Sheesh, at least pick up your stuff!
Yama is not in my name!
Now you are just trying all the Kawa names!
-I have not talked to a classmate or raised my voice in so long...
-Wait, was there a hashi in your name?
-I have not talked to a classmate or raised my voice in so long...
-I have not talked to a classmate or raised my voice in so long...
C'mon, let me have a sip.
Oh, hey, did you catch the concert on TV last night?
The lighting and stuff were so cool!
I want to go to a concert someday...
Shindo, you have been hanging out with Miyamura a lot lately, huh?
He is all gloomy and depressing.
And he has tons of piercings and shit.
When that kind of guy loses his temper, it is bad news for everyone.
Who do you think made him get that way?
I know you guys are just mad'because you think he stole me from you.
Do not worry, we will hang out again sometime.
-Shindo changed my whole middle school experience.
-Do you know about the new place that opened up over here?
-Shindo changed my whole middle school experience.
-Yeah, though I have not been yet.
-Shindo changed my whole middle school experience.
-And the person who is changed my high school experience... -What?!
-And the person who is changed my high school experience...
You seem to be having a good time there.
And Mom already went to work...
Only morons catch colds in the summer.
So I cannot have a cold.
You are going to stay home and rest today!
I got to go to school, so do not die while I am gone!
I am not going to die.
Have a good day at school.
Sota sure is growing up quick...
I am so sorry, Kyoko, but there is an emergency at work.
I wish I could stay, but I have to go.
Ugh, my nose is all stuffed up...
Hori-san, do you need a towel?
Let me know when you need a dry one.
I also brought you a sports drink.
Sota called me this morning saying you might die, so I swung by.
Sota called me this morning saying you might die, so I swung by.
Sota called me this morning saying you might die, so I swung by.
Did you get dressed for school this morning?
Did you take any cold meds?
You should change out of your uniform...
YOU-Uh, to get you a drink?
Hori-san, for real, though, you should go lie down.
Kyoko, you are always so good at toughing things out...
I know I should not take advantage of that.
Dad's not around right now, and work's rough on you.
I am not a little kid anymore.
Have a good day at work, Mom!
Why are you never, ever, ever here?!
Hori-san, instead of where are you going,
do you mean, please do not go?
Until you say you do not need me here anymore,
or get sick and tired of looking at my face,
or tell me to buzz off,
I am going to stay right here.
Make sure you drink some water later though, okay?
I called your mom and told Ishikawa-kun to tell school you are sick.
I am in love with you, Hori-san.
Have been for a while now.
There are drinks and food in the fridge.
If you need anything, call or text me.
I am so shocked, my fever's practically disappeared!
Why did he tell me in the middle of all that boring stuff!?
He knew I was awake when he said all that, right?!
I need to know if he said it!
But I do not want to make him say it again!
If I pretend I did not hear it,
maybe we can stay like this for a little while longer...
I Cannot Say It Out Loud
